extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, rottentomatoes.com, Trakt.TV and a lot more. Can also be used for importing / exporting skin settings, adding additional fanart stuff to library and cooking eggs. Needs skin support for most functions.
